hero.description: Building beautiful, functional, and user-friendly web applications with modern technologies and best practices.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My journey in tech and how I grew from a curious student into a full-stack developer

bio.part1: I am a creative Full Stack Developer trained in both web and mobile development. I have real project experience using technologies like React.js, Next.js, and React Native.
bio.part2: I always focus on UI/UX design to create simple and user-friendly interfaces. I am skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Python, and MySQL.
bio.part3: I am a motivated young professional who quickly adapts to new knowledge and enjoys working creatively as part of a team.
